person.persName: Tilford. N. Bruner (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on October 28, 1861. Promoted from 1st Sergeant to 2nd Lieutenant, December 21, 1863; to 1st Lieutenant, July 15, 1864.

bibl.p: Sergeant E.
